stadium.name: The Oakmaul Grounds
stadium.description: Built over the site of the final battle during the liberation of Hafting now rises The Oakmaul Grounds‚Äîpart arena, part monument. The central oak still bears the burn scars of the final battle. Troll ball here feels more like ritual than sport.

stats.pregame_ritual: Wiggling their fingers in a complex, magical-looking pattern.
Tying their bootlaces together and hopping to the starting line.
Attempting to communicate with birds.
Chewing a specific, bitter root said to improve night vision.
Plucking a single hair from a teammate's beard for luck.
Rubbing the Trollball on their armpits for 'grip'.
Organizing a small betting pool on who will score first.
Asking the Trollball for advice, and pretending to listen to its response.
Smelling their own game-worn socks from the previous match.
Anointing their forehead with morning dew.
Performing a series of aggressive, theatrical poses.

stadium.name: The High-Pass Pitch
stadium.description: A field built at a breathtaking altitude in a fortified mountain pass. The air is painfully thin, and the weather is dangerously unpredictable.

stats.pregame_ritual: Tying a small, hand-carved wooden bird to their gear.
Slapping their own helmet until their ears ring.
Avoiding eye contact with anyone wearing the color green.
Sharing a ceremonial, non-alcoholic grog from a communal cup.
Whispering a secret fear to the Trollball before the game.
Reciting their grocery list backward to clear their mind.
Dipping their hands in a bucket of ice-cold well water.
Asking a teammate to tell them a story, but only the beginning.
Exchanging well-wishes with their direct opponent before the game starts.
Singing a sea shanty completely out of tune.
Getting a teammate to punch them in the shoulder, hard.

preGame:
# üéôÔ∏è TUESDAY NIGHT TROLLBALL: PLAYOFF EDITION! üéôÔ∏è

Well, hello there, sports fans and gore-fiends! It's your favorite demon of the airwaves, Nok the Corrupter, coming to you live from **The Oakmaul Grounds** in Hafting! We've got a playoff atmosphere so thick you could cut it with a Vorpal Blade! This is Game 2 of our Best of 3 series, and the pressure is higher than the Demon Prison walls! The **Oread's Summit Tamers** are looking to close the door on **The Greenwatch** after a dominant performance last week. If the Tamers win tonight, it's curtains for the Wardens' favorite team!

I‚Äôm looking down at the pitch, and the ritualistic energy of this stadium is palpable! The **Scarred Oak's Shadow** is looming over the field like a hungry spectator. I see **Salahi Bushey** of the Greenwatch anointing his forehead with morning dew‚Äîlet‚Äôs hope it helps him see the troll head through the blood! Meanwhile, **Kass Fogel** of the Tamers is doing her best to avoid eye contact with anyone wearing green. That‚Äôs a tall order when you‚Äôre playing the Greenwatch in their own backyard! Ha! Talk about a mental hurdle!

Over on the sidelines, **Odericus Juxon** is already slapping her helmet until her ears ring! That‚Äôs the spirit! Give yourself a concussion before the opposition can do it for you! The Greenwatch fans are out in force, probably praying to their fancy trees, but the Tamers don't care about popularity‚Äîthey care about results! Will **Sir Randy** and his fancy bow show up to save his precious Wardens? Not likely, folks! The only things being saved tonight are the teeth of anyone smart enough to stay out of **Troy Jorgan‚Äôs** way! Grab your non-alcoholic grog and buckle in, because it‚Äôs time for some beautiful, brutal Trollball! ü¶¥üí•
postGame:
### üèüÔ∏è FINAL SCORE: THE OREAD'S SUMMIT TAMERS 6 - THE GREENWATCH 1 üèüÔ∏è

**Holy mackerel, what a clinic in carnage!** The Oread's Summit Tamers didn't just win; they absolutely dismantled The Greenwatch right under the shade of their precious scarred oak! With this 6-1 victory, the Tamers have swept the series 2-0, sending the 'heroes' of the Wardens straight into the loser's bracket with their tails between their legs! It was a masterpiece of mid-range shooting and bone-snapping defense that would make even Lord Orzalon crack a smile in his cell!

The action started with a bang in the Center Field! **Salahi Bushey** decided he was done being polite and absolutely **INJURED** Mitran Mariand right out of the gate! But the Tamers didn't blink. **Zadoc Wyatan** stepped up and sent a beautiful shoot flying through the goal from distance! **2-0, Tamers!** The Greenwatch tried to respond, but their passes were shakier than a rogue caught in a spotlight. 

The violence just kept escalating! **Dric Trilley** returned the favor for the Tamers, leveling **Goldenberg Rimola** with a tackle that sounded like a dry branch snapping! Not to be outdone, **Saloma Talich** sent **Verne Methuselah** to the healer's tent with a crunch that echoed through the stadium! It was a beautiful display of the sport's true spirit. If Falric wants to steal hearts, he should take notes from Saloma, who was aiming for ribs!

The Greenwatch looked utterly lost in the Center Field. **Nobe Haukom** threw a pass so wild it was practically a gift-wrapped present for **Clippard Burr**, who snagged the interception with demonic glee! Shortly after, **Odericus Juxon** found another opening and buried a second 2-point shoot! The score was climbing, and the Greenwatch‚Äôs hopes were sinking faster than a rock in the Confluence!

Just before the half, **Kass Fogel**‚Äîwho clearly managed to avoid enough green to stay focused‚Äîlaunched another projectile right into the basket! **6-0 for the Tamers!** I haven't seen a blowout this satisfying since the last time a hero tried to lecture me on 'morality' while I was chewing on their greaves! The Greenwatch was in a deep hole, and the thin air of the playoffs was suffocating them.

After a halftime break that saw the healers working overtime to stitch our gladiators back together, the Greenwatch finally showed a spark of life. **Alwyn Wandy** continued the Tamer tradition of violence by injuring **Herriott Dhiren**, but the Greenwatch finally found the end zone! **Goldenberg Rimola** went on a tear, dodging tackles left and right, and **DUNKS THE BALL** for a touchdown! A little late to the party, but a point is a point! 

The game devolved into a glorious slugfest in the final minutes. **Rese Halpern** finally got a lick in, injuring **Odericus Juxon**, and **Madea Mensch** followed up by sending **Zadoc Wyatan** to the sidelines! The Greenwatch were fighting like cornered animals, but the scoreboard doesn't care about 'grit' or 'determination' when you're down by five points!

The final whistle blew, and the silence from the Hafting crowd was deafening! The most unpopular team in the realm just walked into 'Hallowed Ground' and took a giant dump on the ritual! The Greenwatch are headed to the loser's bracket, and I couldn't be happier. Maybe **Sir Randy** can use his fancy bow to hunt for some dignity, because they certainly didn't find any on the pitch today!

Congratulations to the **Oread's Summit Tamers**! They move forward in the playoffs, proving that slapping your own helmet and singing out-of-tune sea shanties is the true path to glory! As for the Greenwatch, maybe they should try rubbing something besides their armpits on the ball next time! 

This is Nok the Corrupter, signing off! Stay violent, Osterra! üòàüî•
